author: 39jennad
title: Bentley Hotel Review -
text: I was impressed by the design of the rooms and the view from the 15th floor was absolutely beautiful with the Ed Koch Queensboro Bridge directly in sight. However, there were only a few things that I would critique. They supply a keurig, but you have to pay $2 per keg cup you use-which should be free. Also, the wifi in your rooms are not free- they will charge your credit card. Other than that, it was a lovely stay.
